text: Ila Walawi hawopegwa honhu honeche hali hemwe, mina honhu hawo howa ndo watambika wa kumkolela mijito Mkulu Nguluwi. Gadi na Lubeni na nusu ya nhanzi ya Manase, mina nawapegwa honhu ha ubanzi wa kolilawilaga isanya kuli lwanda lwa Yolodani. Nawapegwa honhu aho na Musa, chitumagwa wa Mkulu Nguluwi.‚Äù
